auth_confirm_password.description: Message for the form's field where the user must provide for a second time his password.

auth_error_message_email_already_in_use.defaultMessage: L'indirizzo email è già in uso da un altro account.
auth_error_message_email_already_in_use.description: Error message if user signs up with an email already present at database

auth_error_message_email_not_verified.defaultMessage: L'indirizzo mail non è stato ancora verificato.
auth_error_message_email_not_verified.description: Error message if user tried to login with an unverified account

auth_go_back.description: Text for the go back link in the authentication pages

closed_event_card_know_more.description: Invitation to expand closed card and get full details about event

closed_volunteer_card_know_more.description: Invitation to expand closed card and get full details about volunteer

closed_volunteer_card_years_old.description: Words that follow up the digits that compose the age, e.g. '20 years old'

email_login_as_organization_access.description: Initial message that invites users (organizationss) to login to the app using his email

email_login_as_organization_password_for.description: Message that user (organization) will click if he forgot his password

email_login_as_volunteer_access.description: Initial message that invites users (volunteers) to login to the app using his email

email_login_as_volunteer_password_forgot.description: Message that user (volunteer) will click if he forgot his password

email_login_as_volunteer_register.defaultMessage: Non sei ancora iscritto? Registrati adesso!
email_login_as_volunteer_register.description: Message to prompt the user (volunteer) for registering into the app

exampleMessage.description: Example message with device's name injection

form_error_email_required.description: Error message when user does not fill the email field

form_error_first_name_required.description: Error message when user does not fill the first name field

form_error_last_name_required.description: Error message when user does not fill the last name field

form_error_password_must_match.description: Error message when user fills the password and confirmation password fields with different values

form_error_password_required.defaultMessage: Inserisci la tua password tra gli 8 e i 32 caratteri
form_error_password_required.description: Error message when user does not fill the password field or the field is wrongly valued

homepage_volunteering_all.description: Reference to both events and organizations in the homepage

homepage_volunteering_intro.description: Message at the top of the homepage search results box

homepage_volunteering_know_more.description: Invitation to go to the dedicated search view

login_instead.description: Alternative message if user wants to login with his email

login_organization.description: Initial message that invites organization owners to login to the app with their email

login_organization_redirect.description: Message that user will click to be redirected to organization page

login_register_as_organization.description: Message to prompt an organization owner for registering it's organization into the app

login_standard_message.description: Standard button message through which the user can proceed with login

login_volunteer_access_with_standard.description: Initial message that invites users to login to the app

login_volunteer_continue_with_email.description: Button message if user chooses the login through email option

recovery_create_new_password_button.description: Text for the button to trigger the new password creation in the password-recovery/new-password page

recovery_organization_title.description: Title of the organizations's password recovery page

recovery_send_link_button.description: Password recovery page's button so start the recovery process by sending the appropriate link to the user

recovery_volunteer_title.description: Title of the volunteer's password recovery page

side_drawer_edit_profile.description: Edit the profile text in the app's menu

signup_organization_already_subscribed.defaultMessage: Il tuo ente è già iscritto? Accedi al portale
signup_organization_already_subscribed.description: Text for the link to the login page to be shown in the organization's signup view

signup_organization_button.description: Text for signup button in the organization's signup page

signup_organization_title.description: Title of the organization's signup page

signup_volunteer_already_subscribed.defaultMessage: Sei già iscritto? Accedi al portale
signup_volunteer_already_subscribed.description: Text for the link to the login page to be shown in the volunteer's signup view

signup_volunteer_mail_sent_back_to_login.description: Link to give the user the opportunity to go back to the login page

signup_volunteer_mail_sent_congratulatio.description: Title of the congratulatory page where the volunteer will be redirected upon successful signup

signup_volunteer_mail_sent_main_text.defaultMessage: Manca poco! Ti abbiamo inviato una mail per confermare che tu non sia una spia aliena.
signup_volunteer_mail_sent_main_text.description: Title of the congratulatory page where the volunteer will be redirected upon successful signup

signup_volunteer_title.description: Title of the volunteer's signup page

toast_desc_email_verification_success.defaultMessage: La tua mail è stata verificata. Benvenuto in Help2Help!
toast_desc_email_verification_success.description: Description to show when user successfully verified their email.

toast_desc_generic_login_error.defaultMessage: Si è verificato un errore durante il login. Si prega di riprovare più tardi.
toast_desc_generic_login_error.description: A generic error when user cannot login due to unknown reasons.

toast_desc_generic_missing_data_error.defaultMessage: Completa tutti i campi per poter proseguire
toast_desc_generic_missing_data_error.description: Generic description when user still needs to complete all required fields in a form

toast_desc_generic_signup_error.defaultMessage: Si è verificato un errore durante la creazione dell'account
toast_desc_generic_signup_error.description: A generic error when user cannot sign up.

toast_desc_logout_success.defaultMessage: Attendiamo con ansia il tuo ritorno.
toast_desc_logout_success.description: Description to show when user successfully logged out.

toast_desc_password_do_not_match_errror.description: Error message to show when the two passwords provided in a registration or password reset form do not match.

toast_desc_password_recovery_error.defaultMessage: Si è verificato un errore durante la procedura di ripristino password, riprovare più tardi.
toast_desc_password_recovery_error.description: Error message to show when password recovery was not successful.

toast_desc_password_recovery_reset_succe.defaultMessage: La tua password è stata reimpostata correttamente. Prova ad accedere all'app!
toast_desc_password_recovery_reset_succe.description: Success message to show when password reset due to password recovery request was successful.

toast_desc_password_recovery_success.defaultMessage: Una mail con il link per il ripristino della password è stata inviata al tuo account
toast_desc_password_recovery_success.description: Success message to show when password recovery request was successful.

toast_desc_signup_success.defaultMessage: Iscrizione avvenuta correttamente. Dovrebbe esserti stata inviata una mail.
toast_desc_signup_success.description: Description to show when user successfully signed up.

toast_desc_wrong_link_error.defaultMessage: Il link risulta errato, prova a ricontrollare la tua mail.
toast_desc_wrong_link_error.description: Error message to show when email action (recover pwd, verify mail) could not be completed due to incorrect link.

toast_title_email_verification_success.description: Title to show when user successfully verified their email.

toast_title_invalid_data_error.description: Title when user has filled all fields but the inserted values are not valid

toast_title_logout_success.description: Title of the message to show when user successfully logged out.

toast_title_missing_data_error.description: Title when user still needs to complete all required fields in a form

toast_title_standard_formal_error.description: A formal error message to signal the user that something went wrong

toast_title_standard_formal_success.description: A formal success message to signal the user that the operation was successful

toast_title_standard_informal_error.description: An informal error message to signal the user that something went wrong

toast_title_standard_informal_success.description: An informal success message to signal the user that the operation was successful

user_menu_profile_photo_alt_text.description: Alt text for image of the current user

volunteer_profile_alt_text.description: Alt text for image of the volunteer
